message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to acquire a high-value product. I believe you'll find it to be a great addition to your collection. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. Let me know if this is something you'd like to consider.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $750000. I hope this aligns better with my budget.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that $750000 is a significant reduction from my initial offer, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell the product to you for $850000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, considering the value I've placed on the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $800000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

I'm glad we're getting closer to a deal, Bob. However, I'm not quite ready to meet you at $800000. I can offer you a slight discount, but I need to stay above $800000 to meet my minimum expectations. I can sell the product to you for $825000. This is my final offer in this range.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $810000. I hope this proposal is within your acceptable range.
